# GCCD Pune 2025 Interactive CLI
üå©Ô∏è Welcome to the Google Cloud Community Day Pune 2025 CLI! Explore the event with this interactive tool.

## Install
```bash
pip install gccdpune
```

## Usage

Get a hint:
```bash
gccdpune --date
Hint: Clouds part in Pune, day is a dozen!
Guess the date with: `gccdpune DD-MM-YY` (e.g., `gccdpune 12-06-25`)
```
Guess the date:
```bash
gccdpune 12-06-25
Wrong guess! Hint: The month is a prime number!
Try again with: `gccdpune DD-MM-YY`
```
Venue info:
```bash
gccdpune --venue
```
See commands:
```bash
gccdpune --help
```
